item.title: JavaScript: the weird part
item.description: I keep a little list of these by my desk for my own sick amusement (which is something that my pal oxguin reckons is not a fact to be shared out loud). If you like this little lot, then you would probably enjoy some of the prior art at wtfjs. Comparison craziness Letâ€™s start by making x an array with 0 in it. var x = [0] // [0] It should equal itself, which is good.
